head: TIMELINE OF THE INTERNET
title: History Of Academic Networks
description: Singaporeâ€™s academic network evolved from initial university connections to the advanced SingAREN infrastructure, supporting high-speed data exchange, collaborative research, and global academic partnerships over the past decades.

head: TIMELINE OF THE INTERNET
title: History Of Public WiFi
description: Over the past 20 years, Singapore has built a strong public WiFi network that provides widespread, high-speed internet access and supports its Smart Nation vision through expanding free and commercial hotspots across the island.
